Name: Blazing Feather Spicy Meat
Desc: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators on the team by 24%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonators in Co-Op Mode.
Bg:
Changli's favorite dish, which is made with extra chilis.
The vibrant redness hints at its intense flavor, which seems to leap out of the bowl. Served alongside rice and a cup of osmanthus syrup, amidst the bustling ambiance of Huangdou Mingting, it provides a heavenly culinary experience.
While few in Mingting, apart from Changli, venture to taste this delicacy, it's a cherished household favorite among families in Hongzhen. Accompanied by wine, it adds an extra layer of warmth to the dining experience.
